name.description: The name of the service. This may be different from the name in the package.json

startTime.description: The timestamp for the last time this service was started

enabled.description: Indicates if the service should be running or stopped

deploymentInfo.description: Information about the node application deployed for this service

env.description: List of environment variables set for the node application

executors.description: List of executors the service is running on

containers.description: List of containers that run this service

instances.description: List of instances that run this service

groups.description: List of groups used for routing or partitioning
